name: Career Tracks
description:
Career Tracks is an endless runner without any hazards. You've gotta earn, baby, earn. Pick up money off the track, while expenses are automatically removed from you with the ceaseless regularity. As long as you keep earning at least as much as you pay out, you get to be a part of this society, but as soon as your wallet is empty...

Controls:

W or Cursor/Joystick/Dpad Up - Move Up

S or Cursor/Joystick/Dpad Down - Move Down

Made in less than 48 hours for #gmtkjam 2018
